=============================
Resources for ChiantiPy Users
=============================

Mailing Lists
=============

chiantipy-announce_

.. _chiantipy-announce: https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/chiantipy-announce

  * Announcements of new releases or features of ChiantiPy 



chiantipy-users_

.. _chiantipy-users: https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/chiantipy-users

  * Discussion list for ChiantiPy users


Forums
======

Help_

.. _Help:  https://sourceforge.net/projects/chiantipy/forums/forum/907391

`Open discussion`_

.. _Open discussion:  https://sourceforge.net/projects/chiantipy/forums/forum/907390

The Wiki
